commit.message:
gjavah.c (is_first_data_member): New global variable.

2003-03-04  Andrew Haley  <aph@redhat.com>

        * gjavah.c (is_first_data_member): New global variable.
        (print_c_decl): If it's the first data member, align it as the
        superclass.
        (process_file): Set is_first_data_member.

From-SVN: r64247

+        superclass.
+        (process_file): Set is_first_data_member.
